name: A Walk From Nothing - Ludum Dare 45
name_original: A Walk From Nothing - Ludum Dare 45
description:
You find yourself in a dream world, only to find out you need to make a decision. Will you choose the right path for yours.

  • WASD = Movement
  • E = Interact
  • C = Crouch
  • Space = Jump

A French-Canadian Studios is a new indie game development situated in Quebec, Canada. A Walk From Nothing is made by Jonathan Fournier for Ludum Dare 45 and is my first video game release. I'm also working on a first game Called Dementophobia and the prologue for this game will be out soon. Thank you for your support and if you'd like to help development, check out the social media links and ways to donate.
